itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Morgan Price (18 August 1917 – 19 July 1992), also known by the nickname of "Big G", was a Welsh rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s, and coached rugby league in the 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Llanelli RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Leeds (Heritage №), Halifax (Heritage № 599) and Doncaster (Heritage № 21) (two spells) (captain), as a centre, i.e. number 3 or 4, and coached at club level for Doncaster,
